titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Sterling Memorial Library, Yale University, Photographs
Sterling Memorial Library, Yale University, Photographs
titlestmt.author: compiled by Manuscripts and Archives Staff

publicationstmt.publisher: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Friday January 11, 2019 at 09:05

did.unittitle: Sterling Memorial Library, Yale University, photographs

repository.corpname: Yale University. Department of Manuscripts and Archives

did.abstract: The materials consist of photographs and pictures of Sterling Memorial Library at Yale. Includes views of interiors, exteriors, decoration, and construction.

odd.head: General note
odd.p: Forms part of Yale Record Group 46-B (YRG 46-B), Records and materials documenting individual Yale buildings, facilities, and grounds.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Sterling Memorial Library, Yale University, Photographs (RU 696). Manuscripts and Archives, Yale University Library.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The materials are arranged in three series and subsequent accessions. I. Construction Progress Photographs, 1927-1930. II. Interiors, Exteriors, and Decoration, circa 1927-1969. III. Negatives, circa 1930s-1940.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: The materials consist of photographs and pictures of Sterling Memorial Library at Yale. Includes views of interiors, exteriors, decoration, and construction.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.
